# Q5_06_Conversion

- 문제 페이지: 128
- 풀이 페이지: 298

## Command

```sh
javac -Xlint -d ./Java/classes ./Java/CtCILibrary/CtCILibrary/*.java ./Java/Ch\ 05.\ Bit\ Manipulation/Q5_06_Conversion/*.java

java -cp ./Java/classes Q5_06_Conversion.QuestionA
java -cp ./Java/classes Q5_06_Conversion.QuestionB
```

## Output

### QuestionA

```txt
-23432: 11111111111111111010010001111000
512132: 00000000000001111101000010000100
Required number of bits: 23
```
